title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I choose the SWT.MULTI option in ControlExampleText, something unexpected happens.
EB: I hear a Windows 'ding' sound, which typically indicates that an incorrect action has been performed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the application. 
2. Navigate to the ControlExampleText section. 
3. Select the SWT.MULTI option. 
4. Observe the unexpected behavior of the beep sound.
